'''Evermotion Mechanical Painting - Tenshukaku''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Evermotion Mechanical Painting - Tenshukaku is obtainable from [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Evermotion Mechanical Painting: Invoker|Evermotion Mechanical Painting: Invoker]] during the [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!]] event.
